dmca.title: Site has copied portions of my website and is violating copyright laws
dmca.body:
nc

  _____  

From: Morgan Thomas [mailto:webmaster@phpbbforfree.com] 
Sent: Monday, May 16, 2005 11:37 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; abuse@theplanet.com; legal@theplanet.com
Subject: Site has copied portions of my website and is violating copyright
laws



My name is Morgan Thomas, I am the owner of www.phpbbforfree.com
<http://www.phpbbforfree.com/>  the website www.forumcreator.com
<http://www.forumcreator.com/>  has copied portions of my main site at
www.phpbbforfree.com <http://www.phpbbforfree.com/>  and I would like the
content which is violating copyright laws to be removed. The content to
which they have copied is copyrighted and therefore the site owner is
committing a crime. 

 

I own a very large free forum host hosting over 30,000 phpbb forums. Many
other smaller hosts running the same script I bought have been copying
portions if not all of my site from the content on the main page to my aup
and tos. I have been going around informing different datacenters of this
fact and they have been acting accordingly by getting the infringing website
owners to remove the content or the server is pulled. In most cases server
pull was not needed. Please get back to me and let me know if any other
information is needed. I started my site in sept of last year and I
registered my domains for this site a year ago in anticipation of the
scripts release. Other websites that have copied my content include
www.phpbb4you.com <http://www.phpbb4you.com/>  where I am currently in talks
with their legal department as that individual has blatantly copied my site
word for word.
